column4: I'm afraid if I use Linux too much, I will forget how to use Windows and appear retarded in front of others.
been ls'ing at dos prompt have we?
and when they look confused give them this url: http://enlightenment.sourceforge.net/
no.. no IE ...plenty of other browsers out there
nope... you don't have to have windows
ok ... feel free to come back here if you have any issues
its what this channel is here for
its time to take a look at the faq
most of the questions you're asking are answered there
